Message:
I captured the audience’s gaze
the moment they heard
the boom of my voice.

Standing among them
was that young boy...

Keep your eyes on me.
I’m about to turn that
frown upside down!

Here I go!
Check out these
ultra-fast quick shots,
and magnificent gun spinning!

After I closed out my
performance with a cool pose,
the children responded with
smiles and applause.

But, the only one that wasn’t
laughing was that elderly man.

...Guess I’m not there yet.
I wasn’t able to put a smile
on everyone’s face.

The moment that thought
ran through my head,
cheerful music started to play.

“Let’s do this together.
We’ll brighten up this festival,
and put smiles on
everyone’s faces!”

They then started putting on
all different kinds of performances.

Keep your eyes on us.
There’s no way you can
stop us from putting
a smile on your face!
